page.title: 04Leisure time in Toppesfield
page.content: At primary school children take part in athletics,cross-country,football, netball,rounders and swimming.After school they use the village playing field which has a slide,climbing frame and swings.The Brownie pack meets at the Village Hall on Tuesdays and a youth club is held there on Thursday evenings.There is also a Sunday School.Cubs,Guides and junior football are only available in neighbouring villages.The nearest public swimming pools and sports centres are several miles away and parents with cars are needed to enable children to use these facilities.Because the roads are narrow and dangerous for cycling,a B.M.X. track would be welcome.The children would also like a tennis court as this could be used by girls as well as boys.
